CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 2, 1965, pg. 14, reads: "Complete Red Cross Course - The nurses of Macedonia Baptist Church received their certificates, recently, upon completing the prescribed course for American Red Cross Home Nursing. Mrs. Eunice W. Cook, R. N. (right center), is making the award, while the pastor, the Rev. William J. Harvey, looks on. Others shown are Mrs. Mary Louis Bennett, the instructor; Mmes. Mary Martin, Ruth Thaker, Blanche Carver, Jessie London and Wylene Wright. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Eunice Cook presenting certificates to nurses for completion of Red Cross home nursing course, surrounded by Mary Louis Bennett, Mary Martin, Ruth Thaker, Blanche Carver, Jessie London, Wylene Wright, and Rev. William J. Harvey in Macedonia Baptist Church
